definition.name: google-drive-download-action
definition.description: Github action for downlaoding google drive files or folder using Drives: list API
definition.author: raeperd

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.description: Client id of oauth2 client application

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.description: Client secret of oauth2 client application

inputs.name: redirectUri
inputs.description: Redirect uri of oauth2 client application

inputs.name: q
inputs.description: Query string to search for files and folders

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to download files default to working directory
